ribbon.syncTasksScreenTip: Usually not nessecary but if something went out-of-sync, you can use this to force a full-sync

general.couldNotUploadAttachments: Couldn't upload all attachments. Please try again.
general.loginFirst: Please login to Jira in settings menu first!
general.couldNotDetectEmail: Couldn't determine the current email. Please switch the focus to another email and try again
general.couldNotRenderMarkup: Could not render the selected text as Jira markup. Please switch to plain text or contact us to get this fixed!
general.restartNecessary: Jira for Outlook made some changes to your Outlook. Please restart Outlook once again to use all new functions.
general.couldNotReachJira: Couldn't connect to Jira. Either the system does not exist anymore or is currently not reachable. (e.g. Proxy or VPN is missing)
general.applicationLinkUnknown: The application link is unknown. Please make sure you have an application link in Jira called: yasoonjira
general.timestampRefused: Jira refused the request because of time differences. Either your local time is not set correctly or the Jira server has a wrong time (Different timezones are ok).
general.certificateInvalid: The certificate you are using in the application link is invalid. Please make sure you have setup Jira correctly. Afterwards visit the settings and click on "Reload System Information"
general.oauthParameterAbsent:
Jira refused the request due to a missing Authorization. Please check the following help article: 
https://bit.ly/parameterAbsent
general.ssoActive:
Jira refused the request due to a missing Authorization. Please check the following help article: 
https://bit.ly/ssoActive
general.unexpectedJiraError: This did not work due to an unexpected Jira error.
general.taskSyncFailed: Something did not work correctly. Please make sure you are connected or contact the yasoon support.

dialog.errorInitConnection: Connection Error. Loading Values from Jira not possible. Please check your internet connection or if a VPN access is required.
dialog.errorInitUnknown: The dialog could not be rendered completely due to an unknown error. Please contact our support team.
dialog.errorFieldRendering: This field could not be rendered correctly
dialog.errorNoRequestType: You have to set a request type when creating a service desk issue
dialog.errorNoEpicForSubtasks: A subtask cannot be assigned to an epic.
dialog.errorSelectIssue: Please select the issue you want to comment!
dialog.errorNoData: Please add either an comment or select an attachment
dialog.errorSubmitComment: Connection Error! Commenting did not work: {{error}}
dialog.errorAttachment:
Connection Error: Uploading the attachments failed:
{{error}}
dialog.errorSubmitIssue:
Sorry, that did not work. Check your input and try again.
{{- error}}
dialog.errorAfterSubmitIssue:
The issue has been created, but there happend an error afterwards. Please check your data.
{{error}}
dialog.errorCreateAttachment:
Issue {{key}} created, but uploading the attachments did not work.
{{error}}
dialog.SDExplanation: Service Desk assignments make the issue visible for the reporter in the Service Desk as "Own Request"
dialog.titleToggleJiraMarkup: Toggle between Jira Markup or plaintext
dialog.titleReplaceWith: If you like to add the whole mail as .msg attachment, use the "add attachment" link below
dialog.labelDescription: Start typing to get a list of possible matches or press down to select.
dialog.createUserError403: You are not allowed to create new users in Jira. Please contact your administrator to use this function
dialog.createUserError404: Your Jira instance is too old and does not support this functionality
dialog.createUserErrorOther: That does not work. Please try it again in a few seconds or contact our support (contact@yasoon.de)
dialog.timetrackingDescrOriginal: The original estimate of how much work is involved in resolving this issue.
dialog.timetrackingDescrRemain: An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
dialog.mentionsAlert: For User Mentions you need to select an project or issue first
dialog.serviceDeskWarningBody: The issue does not have a request type. </br> Even it is a Service Desk issue, you cannot share comments with the customer.
dialog.attachmentAddToBlacklistDialog: Do you want to ignore this image for future uploads? This can be used to exclude small, recurring images (like signatures) from being selected/included automatically. Please note, that this ignore list will distribute to your colleagues!
dialog.attachmentReferenceStillActive: The description still contains a reference to this attachment - remove it as well?

logWork.title: Log Work
logWork.timeSpentDescription: An estimate of how much time you have spent working

settings.headingLogin: Please choose your Jira instance and login.
settings.headingChooseSettings: Please choose your settings. Only logout if you like to stop the service or like to connect to another Jira system.
settings.addMailHeaderAutomatically: Automatically add email header to description
settings.enableUserConfig: Enable User Configuration in Edit & Create Screens
settings.showFeedIf: Show feed entry for issue if:
settings.loginNotPossible: Login to this systen not possible due to a missing configuration. Please contact your admin.
settings.pendingUpdates: There are pending updates which prevent this action. Please check for latest updates in the Outlook menu: File --> Jira, restart Outlook and try again
settings.pendingUpdatesApp: There are pending updates which prevent this action. Please restart Outlook and try again
settings.filterChange: Changes to filters will be available with the next Outlook restart.

purchase.heading: Jira for Outlook Trial expired
purchase.introText:
Thanks for using Jira for Outlook. We hope, it saved you a lot of time and it has been useful for you.
Unfortunately your Jira for Outlook is currently running in a trial and it has come to an end.
purchase.adminValue: Don't worry, it's not too late to take advantage of Jira for Outlook and make it absolutely easy to work with Jira issues.
purchase.adminSteps: Simply follow these steps to proceed. If you have any questions, just send a mail to our support team.
purchase.adminServerStep1: Get licenses for your company. Choose the tier that fits best for you.
purchase.adminServerStep2: Setup a personal welcome message in the admin panel to have the best experience for your users.
purchase.adminServerStep3: Share the setup with all users. If you need help for the rollout, our support team will help you out.
purchase.adminCloudStep1: Subscribe to the Outlook App Jira addon here.
purchase.adminCloudStep2: Setup a personal welcome message in the admin panel to have the best experience for your users.
purchase.adminCloudStep3: Share the setup with all users. If you need help for the rollout, our support team will help you out.
purchase.userText:
If you like to continue to use, please ask your Jira admin to get a full license for you.
Here is some help who to contact:
purchase.userActionButton: Send your admin a mail now
